show_name: Doraemon the Movie: Nobita and the Space Heroes
other_title: Doraemon il film - Nobita e gli eroi dello spazio (Italian)
Eiga Doraemon: Nobita no Space Heroes (Japanese)
映画ドラえもん のび太の宇宙英雄記（スペースヒーローズ） (Japanese)
電影哆啦A夢：大雄之宇宙英雄記 (Chinese (Taiwan))
電影多啦A夢：大雄之宇宙英雄記 (Chinese (Hong Kong))
plot: Nobita and his superhero TV show-loving friends use Doraemon's secret tool, the "Director Burger," to start shooting a science fiction movie of their own. However, an alien who crash-lands on Earth mistakes them for real superheroes, which leads to a showdown with space pirates.
opening_theme: "Yume wo Kanaete Doraemon" (夢をかなえてドラえもん;Make Dreams Come True, Doraemon) by mao
